modName: Thieves Guild Duelist Armor CBBEv3 Echo
summary: My own take on Hentai\'s Karliah 2 Armor.  A standalone, craftable Thieves Guild Armor.
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/pCCVm.png[/IMG]
At first, I was just making a CBBE conversion of Hentai\'s Karliah 2 armor.  However, Nausicaa beat me to the punch.  Rather than shelve the work I already did, I changed up the armor and reverted the look somewhat to the Thieves Guild Master\'s Armor.  I was pretty pleased with the results, so here it is.  As always, I also modified the CBBE v3 body somewhat. For those familiar with my work, this armor uses the same body mesh changes as my previous two replacers.  

This is a standalone, craftable non-replacer version that can be constructed at any forge (Under Leather).  It is unenchanted, with the armor rating of the Guild Master\'s.  

UPDATE: Added optional replacers for the standard Thieves Guild Armor and Guild Master\'s Armor.  

[center]Please check out my Savior\'s Hide and Ancient Nord Armor replacers, Falmer Darkseeker Armor, and Field Mage Outfit[/center]

[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10790]Ancient Nord and Savior\'s Hide CBBE v3[/url][/center]
[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11963]Falmer Darkseeker Armor CBBE v3[/url][/center]
[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14198]Field Mage Outfit CBBE v3[/url][/center]

[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/RollK.jpg[/IMG] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Z7yeG.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ePssp.jpg[/IMG] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/51eVt.jpg[/IMG] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/G1OOs.jpg[/IMG][/center]

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/xtr5j.png[/IMG]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666]Caliente\'s Female Body Mod[/url]
- CBBE v3 Compatible Texture (I use [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6554]Navetsea\'s[/url]) 


[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0v4Qu.png[/IMG]
Stand Alone Version:
  - Open the archive
  - Copy \"Guild Duelist Armor.esp\" to Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data (standalone version only)
  - Copy the Meshes folder to the Meshes folder in Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data
  - Copy the Textures folder to the Textures folder in Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data
  - Select \"Yes\" when prompted

Replacers Version:
  - Open the archive
  - Copy the Meshes folder to the Meshes folder in Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data
  - Copy the Textures folder to the Textures folder in Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data
  - Select \"Yes\" when prompted

NOTE: Versions can be used together or individually.

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/e2ur9.png[/IMG]
- some clipping issues in the front belt area, when sneaking.


[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/WQcge.png[/IMG]
Caliente - CBBE is an incredible work of art and I very much appreciate Caliente\'s dedication and generosity to the Skyrim community. 

Hentai - This armor relies heavily on Hentai\'s Karliah 2 Armor.  Hentai was gracious enough to allow me to use his work, for which he has my most sincere thanks.

Bethesda - Creating a great game and encouraging us to add something of our own to it.


[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hQUqJ.png[/IMG]
To CherryHotaling for an excellent and thorough 3DS Max and Nifskope tutorial on armor conversions.
MxR for featuring my mods on Skyrim Mods Weekly.
Saiodin for featuring my mods on Skyrim Mods Series.

And Everyone who tried out my previous mod, especially those who gave feedback, suggestions, and endorsed. 

[center]Featured on Skyrim Mod Series[/center]

[center][youtube]NNaCh3T-D2s[/youtube][/center]
author: Echo 1162
